metadata.title: CVE-2019-11474 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
coders/xwd.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.31 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (floating-point exception and application crash) by crafting an XWDimage file, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-11008 andCVE-2019-11009.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11474` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.4+really1.3.32-1
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.4+really1.3.32-1
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.4+really1.3.32-1
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.4+really1.3.32-1
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.4+really1.3.32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4+really1.3.32-1').
